name: Rainless
description:
Rainless is a game made in a weekend for GDL Jam.

As Rainless City new Sheriff it's your job to take care of every citizen, well, mainly those lost in the desert.

Rescue thirsty people. Find valuable scrap buried in the sand. Trade scrap at the city's shop for great perks. Stay hydrated.

Theme: Thirst

Authors:

DasPanjo and jvolonte 

Special thanks to Quaternius for the human 3D models!

Music Desert Caravan composed and produced by JHSoundtracks.
